Uses of Package
it.polimi.ingsw.Le_Bestie.Network.Messages.S2C

  • Packages that use it.polimi.ingsw.Le_Bestie.Network.Messages.S2C 
    Package Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.Le_Bestie.Network.Messages  
    it.polimi.ingsw.Le_Bestie.Network.Messages.S2C  
  • Classes in it.polimi.ingsw.Le_Bestie.Network.Messages.S2C used by it.polimi.ingsw.Le_Bestie.Network.Messages 
    Class Description
    AcceptedSetupBuilder
    The server sends to the client that the builders setup positions are correct
    AskBuilderChosen
    The server asks the client the builder to use for an action at the beginning of the turn
    AskCell
    The server asks the client the cell to use for an action after he has selected a builder
    AskCellError
    The server re-asks the client the builder to use for an action at the beginning of the turn because the first cell he has selceted wasn't usable for the game rules
    AskNumPlayers
    The server asks the first client connected in the lobby, the number of players for the match
    AskPositionBuilders
    The server asks the client the builders setup positions, before the game starts
    AskUsePower
    The server asks the client if he wants to use the power of his GodCard
    AskUsername
    The server asks the client his username
    ErrorUsername
    The server tells the client that his username can't be used (already taken)
    LostForDisconnection
    The server notifies the client that he has lost for the disconnection of another player (all clients lose)
    OpenLobby
    The server notifies the client that he is inserted in the lobby
    SendBeginTurn
    The server notifies the client that it's his turn
    SendCardToPlayers
    The server sends to the client the GodCard randomly assigned to him
    SendEndTurn
    The server notifies the client that his turn is finished
    SendGameStart
    The server notifies the client that the game is starting
    SendHasLost
    The server notifies the client that he has lost
    SendHasWon
    The server notifies the client that he has won
    SendOpponents
    The server sends to the client his opponents in the match, and their GodCards
    SendPowerMessage
    The server asks the client if he wants to use the power of his GodCard
    SendUpdatedBoard
    The server updates the clients of the changes on the board, after every action
  • Classes in it.polimi.ingsw.Le_Bestie.Network.Messages.S2C used by it.polimi.ingsw.Le_Bestie.Network.Messages.S2C 
    Class Description
    S2C
    Class S2C absract class for message from server to client
